So the school can combine the excursions with the study tour to save in expenses & thus mix pleasure with education. Hence it will become quite interesting for the students.

The school can also hold social service activities for the students. This will help the students know the present situation and condition of their surroundings. They will also learn the importance of serving & helping each other. The school can also thus help in making the students better citizens with good nature & culture.
